name: Robert Graham Cream w/ Khaki Accent Linen Slacks
description:
Brand: Robert Graham
Size: 8
Fabric: 100% Linen
Care Instructions: Dry Clean Only
Condition: Like New w/o Tags
MSRP: $268 (Robertgraham.us)
Suggested for Body Type: Haute- A and C

Notes: Refer to brand sizing chart before purchase @ http://www.robertgraham.us/sizechart/

For the international fashion star, what better way to show your flair from across the pond than in these comfortable yet classic Robert Graham linen slacks?  Accented by the khaki-colored bound seam belt loops, and with a natural crease, these pants are sure to look stylish today or years from now with their flattering fit and not quite white, never yellow color that can fit any season or outfit.  Dress it up with a silky blouse or bundle up with a stylish jacket (see pictures, items available on Haute Homage).  Make the clothes fit you, wherever you are!

name: I.N.C. Black Jacquard Blazer w/ Jet Beading
description:
Brand: I.N.C./ International Concepts
Size: 4P
Fabric: Outer: 60% Polyester/40% Cotton, Lining: 100% Acetate
Care Instructions: Dry Clean Only
Condition: Like New w/o Tags
MSRP: $119.50 (Macys.com)
Suggested for Body Type: Haute- A and B


Want to make a statement without shouting?  This always classy blazer makes anyone look "haute-y" with only a little lip gloss and a single accessory.  The exciting jet beads that make up its mock-knot-style buttons along with its jaquard fabric which creates the illusion of negative-positive space floral designs depending on the lighting, make this subtle piece a striking addition to any vintage diva's wardrobe.  Beautifully tailored to fit either small or medium busts and to make a waist out of even a straighter figure, don't miss out on this must have "Little Black Jacket".

name: Silver Shantung Pencil Skirt w/Jet Embroidery & Beading
description:
Brand: Ann Taylor
Size: 6
Fabric: Outer: 100% Silk, Lining: 100% Acetate
Care Instructions: Dry Clean Only
Condition: Like New w/o Tags
MSRP: $88 (AnnTaylor.com)
Suggested for Body Type: Haute- A thru C

Notes: Refer to brand sizing chart before purchase @ http://www.anntaylor.com/womens-clothing/sizing-info.shtml

A touch of luxe shows through with this striking, whimsical skirt by Ann Taylor, a brand known for it's elegant style.  This skirt, which would be, by itself striking, has the added qualities of gorgeously embroidered flowers with single jet beads as their hearts, scattered across the front of the skirt like a trail of stars.  Add to that a suggestive slit, and this has gone from "just a skirt" to a must have party or social piece.  Don't deny your closet a conversation that is sure to please!

Please check out our black brocade I.N.C. blazer for sale, a perfect complement to this signature piece!  Only available at Haute Homage....

name: Kasper Burberry-Plaid Print Jacket
description:
Brand: Kasper for ASL
Size: 8
Fabric: 65% Wool, 30% Polyester, 5% Other
Care Instructions: Dry Clean Only
Condition: Like New w/o Tags
MSRP: $129 (Macys.com)
Suggested for Body Type: Haute-A thru C

Known as a quality brand for the busy woman, Kasper also shows its young and stylish side in a versatile wool jacket with velvet collar and slightly fitted cuffs.  Dress it down with a white blouse and pair of jeans, or make it preppy-casual with a a cream pair of slacks and a matching purse.  Whatever your mood, it's sure to keep you warm and chic all winter through!

name: J.Jill Embroidered Tweed Long Skirt
description:
Brand: J. Jill Boutique
Size: 10
Fabric: 80% Lyocell /20% Wool
Care Instructions: Cold Wash
Condition: Like New w/o Tags
MSRP: $89-$100 (JJill.com)
Suggested for Body Type: Haute- A and C

Notes: Refer to brand sizing chart before purchase @ http://www.jjill.com/jjillonline/customer/sizeguide_misses.aspx?BID=315850190&h=M&sk=M

This casual wrap skirt with it's paisley embroidery in reds, orange, purples and even a hint of greens, is perfect to show off those new Fall boots you adore!   Closed with hidden buttons, and dropping to just above the ankles on an average figure, it fits best on medium to straighter waists to slope gently at the hips.  Pair it with our complimenting cream blouse, also by J.Jill, or add your own style with a cute turtleneck or cowl top in pink or violet.  Whatever your style, show it with Haute Homage vintage!
